name: get-upload-policy
description: This Lambda function will change a video name in a given s3 bucket

scripts.create: aws lambda create-function --function-name get-upload-policy  --handler index.handler --memory-size 128 --runtime nodejs4.3 --role arn:aws:iam::712095697164:role/lambda-s3-execution-role --timeout 3 --publish --zip-file fileb://Lambda-Deployment.zip

author: Sergey Kazhura
